description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This crypto pool contains CRV and ETH. Please be aware that as crypto pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This crypto pool contains CRV and ETH. Please be aware that as crypto pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss.

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This crypto pool contains CRV and ETH. Please be aware that as crypto pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo criptográfico contiene CRV y ETH. Tenga en cuenta que, dado que los criptogrupos están compuestos por activos de diferentes precios, están sujetos a pérdidas temporales.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu kripto havuzu, CRV ve ETH içerir. Kripto havuzları farklı fiyatlı varlıklardan oluştuğundan, kalıcı kayıplara tabi olduklarını lütfen unutmayın.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 CRV 和 ETH，请注意该池由两种价值不同的资产组成，存在无常损失的风险。
